observation: On May 20th, @FrankGrimes was observed to perform to a satisfactory standard. This was evidenced by his work on the assembly line, where he showed #diligence #efficiency. While his work was satisfactory, he seemed unhappy with the job, grumbling about the monotony and low pay. When Homer Simpson tried to lighten the mood with a joke, Frank became visibly frustrated and snapped at him, displaying #impatience #irritability.
